amendment.description: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to eliminate funding for grants to the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to eliminate funding for grants to the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 277 (Roll no. 605).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 148 - 277 (Roll no. 605).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
